n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source:
<VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>HHA_PROD</SCHEMA> <NAME>SOAP_FR_ITEM</NAME> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>DMSPOSNR</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>OBJECTCODE1</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>OBJECTCODE2</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>OBJECTCODE3</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ACTIVITY</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>VERSION</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>LOCATION</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>CONDITION</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>QUANTITY</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <SUBQUERY>select --<FR_Item> '001' DMSPosNr, --<LabourCodeDetails/> '192' ObjectCode1, 'B' ObjectCode2, '060' ObjectCode3, '391' Activity, '00' Version, 'LO' Location, '00' Condition, --</LabourCodeDetails> '3' Quantity --</FR_Item>
From Dual </SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
